description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Only a real hero can save us when the movies attack!  Join the resistance against the hostile machines and battle the most fearsome foes in movie history.   Blast through cinematic worlds in arcade-style shoot-outs, survive invasions, and fight mega bosses in the ultimate multiplayer shooter adventure ripped from the big screen.  •Travel to 6 extraordinary movie-themed worlds including outer space, deep sea, and more.  •Battle large alien space cruisers, underwater monsters and swarms of robots  •Attack enemies with powerful weapons   •Team up with friends in multiplayer action for up to 4 players
description.short: Only a real hero can save us when the movies attack!  Join the resistance against the hostile machines and battle the most fearsome foes in movie history.   Blast through cinematic worlds in arcade-style shoot-outs, survive invasions, and fight mega bosses in the ultimate multiplayer shooter adventure ripped from the big screen.
